categories: Category:Imperial Navy admirals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: A male human held the rank of admiral in the starfleet of the Galactic Empire. In the aftermath of the Battle of Yavin, between 0 and 1 ABY, he was at the helm of the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Harbinger.

However, the admiral lost the Harbinger to the Rebel Alliance, and he was forced to abandon ship. Upon realizing that Darth Vader would hold him to account for the loss of the Harbinger, the admiral contemplated suicide; as he and several crew members of the Harbinger escaped aboard an Imperial shuttle, the human pointed a blaster pistol to his own head and closed his eyes.
